title: After intentionally feeding with Rammus 2014, I received my mystery gift which was Ninja Rammus!
body:
I thought that I wouldn't receive my gift with several chat restrictions but Riot decided to be generous and gift me Ninja Rammus so I can be happier when I intentionally feed

http://puu.sh/eJfWz/8dd1dd2e8f.jpg
Here are some games in the past
http://puu.sh/eJgr1/2c1518458d.jpg
http://puu.sh/eJgtf/1d74be5e78.jpg
http://puu.sh/eJguB/826cede2f1.jpg
http://puu.sh/eJgvV/087eacce7c.jpg

Anyways, I'm going to try out a game with my new skin. Hopefully I can break my record! I'll update
